resources.string: Let us resolve your claim and renewal related query for your existing policy
* Please add respective country code before dialing the number
E-Locker will allow you to store your all require documents, Which facilitate you to use those document at any time.
To capture or select photos, allow Insurify access to your device\'s photos and media. \nTap Settings > Permissions, and turn Storage on.
To capture and store photos, allow Insurify access to your camera and storage. \nTap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera and Storage on.
To capture and store videoes, allow Insurify access to your camera, Microphone and storage. \nTap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera,Microphone and Storage on.
To add event in calender, allow Insurify access to your Calender. \nTap Settings > Permissions, and turn Calender on.
Allow Insurify access to your Calender. \nTap Settings > Give permissions.
Are you sure want to delete all notifications ?
